name: @fingerprintjs/fingerprintjs-pro-server-api
description: Node.js wrapper for FingerprintJS Sever API

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version

author: FingerprintJS, Inc (https://fingerprintjs.com)
